problems.title: 3D Array Sum Using Pointers
problems.description: Calculate the sum of all elements in a 3D array using pointers.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: x y z (dimensions)
Next x*y lines: z space-separated integers (layer by layer)

sampleTestCases.explanation: Sum of all 8 elements in 2x2x2 array

problems.title: Find Maximum in 3D Array
problems.description: Find the maximum element in a 3D array and return its position using pointers.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: x y z (dimensions)
Next x*y lines: z space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print 'max_value i j k' (value and position)

problems.title: Layer Sum in 3D Array
problems.description: Calculate sum of each layer (x-dimension) in a 3D array using pointers.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: x y z (dimensions)
Next x*y lines: z space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print x lines, each containing sum of that layer

problems.title: Pointer to Pointer - Min Max Swap
problems.description: Use pointer-to-pointer to find positions of min and max in array, then swap them.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print array after swapping min and max, space-separated

sampleTestCases.explanation: Min=1 at index 2, Max=9 at index 3, swapped

problems.title: 3D Array Transpose
problems.description: Transpose a 3D array along specified dimensions using pointers (swap y and z dimensions).
problems.inputFormat:
First line: x y z (dimensions)
Next x*y lines: z space-separated integers
